missAttack(Weapon) - Method in class game.AttackAction
Return Boolean which indicates if the actor misses the target
missAttack(Weapon) - Method in class game.HumanAttackAction
Return Boolean to indicate if the actor misses the target based on miss chance if it is specified in the attack action, else based on 50% chance.
missAttack(Weapon) - Method in class game.ZombieAttackAction
Return a Boolean that indicates whether Zombie will miss the attack based on the miss chance if specified in the attack action, else based on miss chance of different type of weapon being used in that attack.
